text.div:
COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Creatinine Clearance

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    Code Display
    102811001 Creatinine renal clearance, function (observable entity)
    104614007 Creatinine renal clearance measurement (procedure)
    167181009 Measurement of renal clearance of creatinine (procedure)
    442238003 Measurement of creatinine clearance in peritoneal dialysis fluid specimen (procedure)
    442723000 Measurement of creatinine clearance normalized to body surface area in peritoneal dialysis fluid specimen (procedure)

name: COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Creatinine Clearance

concept.display: Measurement of renal clearance of creatinine (procedure)
Measurement of creatinine clearance in peritoneal dialysis fluid specimen (procedure)
Measurement of creatinine clearance normalized to body surface area in peritoneal dialysis fluid specimen (procedure)
